text: Lindsay Davenport was the defending champion, but lost in the final 7–6(7–2), 6–4 against Amélie Mauresmo. It was the 1st title for Mauresmo in the season and the 2nd title in her career. ==Seeds== The first four seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main and Qualifying Draws Adidas International Adidas
title: 2000 Adidas International – Women's Singles
